system.description: When you bring up your superhero name to someone important (your call) for the first time, roll + Savior.

failure.label: Complications...
failure.value: They don’t take you seriously or mistrust you moving forward.

partial.label: Partial success
partial.value: They’ve heard of you; say which of your exploits they’ve heard about and which Label they think applies. The GM will tell you something else they’ve heard, and pick a second Label they assign to you.

success.label: Success!
success.value: They’ve heard of you; say which of your exploits they’ve heard about and which Label they think applies.
